title: Email has disappeared
creator: OzSteveC
content:
Hi all,

I received an email from my outlook.com.au address yesterday with an important image attachement. However, I did not notice the yellow bar with option to enable remote content.

This particular email was replied to by other recipients and therefore it was threaded.

Somehow I have lost most of the thread after trying to see where the attachments were.

The email is still there on other clients as well as the MS web interface. I can see the full thread in another tab in conversation view.

If I do a search for it in my inbox via the search function, it is there.

How do I view this email back in my inbox?

Regards,

Steve

title: Problema con messaggi non letti quando eliminati e non letti
creator: peopleinside
content:
Thunderbird è impostato per considerare un messaggio letto se passano 10 secondi di lettura.

A volte un'email viene eliminata da me prima di tale tempistica ed in questo caso Thunderbird continua a segnalarmi messaggi non letti anche se nell'inbox non ci sono messaggi da leggere.

C'è modo di evitare questo comportamento senza rinunciare all'impostazione di considerare un messaggio come letto dopo 10 secondi?

Con altri client email non ho questo problema, solo Thunderbird mi dà questo problema di segnare che ci sono nuovi messaggi non letti anche per i messaggi cestinati.

Grazie

title: Thunderbird issue with unread deleted messages
creator: peopleinside
content:
Thunderbird is set to flag a message as unread only after 10 sec of reading. Sometimes I delete a message before this time and Thunderbird still notify me that there are unread message also if the inbox has not unread message. The issue will persist if I don't restart Thunderbird or if I don't find that deleted message and set it to read.

Only Thunderbird gives this issue, other email client don't notify me about unread message if i delete a message but still be flagged as unread.

Any solution to have unread notification only for inbox? Thanks.

title: "Moving Thunderbird data to a new computer" can't get it to work
creator: rcandler
content:
I'm trying to copy the data from a PC running xubuntu 2022 onto one running Ubuntu 2024.

I'm following the instructions here (https://www.google.com/search?channel=fs&client=ubuntu-sn&q=moving+thunderbird+data+to+a+new+computer) and all seems to work up to and including "On your destination computer" step 7 (Close Thunderbird). Step 7 "From your Thunderbird profile folder in File Browser, go up two levels" - this sends me to "Common". Step 8 Right click inside the folder, then select Paste.

Here's the problem: we're not told what to click on, but I assume it's ".thunderbird", which only contains 11 items although apparently 348 were transferred. Clicking on empty space (I tried that in desperation) doesn't work. I'm probably overlooking something obvious, but I can't see what that might be. Any suggestions gratefully received. In the meantime, I will keep trying and if I somehow get it to work I'll let you folk know.
metadata: ;category:troubleshooting;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Ubuntu; Linux x86_64; rv:125.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/125.0;product:thunderbird;solver_id:5442087

title: Probleem op één account mail verzenden en binnenhalen Thunderbird
creator: chris.debeer
content:
We gebruiken Thunderbird voor een gmail en hotmail account.

Het Gmail-emailaccount werkt gewoon naar behoren. Het Hotmail-account wil echter niets verzenden of ontvangen. Bij openen van Thunderbird wordt er gevraagd om het wachtwoord. Dat voer ik in, maar deze wordt niet geaccepteerd.

Als ik rechtstreeks in outlook office 365 online het hotmailemailadres open, krijg ik gewoon mijn mail in Office 365.

Het vreemde is als ik via instellingen in Thunderbird zoek op "Wachtwoord" en de onthouden wachtwoorden bekijk, zie ik alleen de gegevens van het Gmail-account en nergens die van het Hotmail account. Servergevens staan allemaal goed.

Ik zou het account kunnen wissen en weer toevoegen. Echter heb ik voor het hotmailaccount handmatige mappen aangemaakt die ik graag wil bewaren.

Wie weet de oplossing van dit probleem?

title: INBOX broken - accidentally did something - now everything automatically redirects to JUNK
creator: dave321
content:
I was working with Tools->Message Filters to add another domain name into the account's e-mail address line vi the Edit... button. I did something I am clueless as to what it was, and now ALL an this account's INBOX contents are in JUNK

  • running a test send to this account, the incoming mail automatically goes into the JUNK folder.
  • JUNK now contains all INBOX contents (going back to 2014) as well as messages manually tagged as junk/spam
  • copying-pasting one or more Subject lines from JUNK to INBOX doesn't work
  • all mail stays in JUNK and nothing stays in INBOX
  • somehow it's as if I've made INBOX be a symbolic link to JUNK.
  • this happens on all my machines:

-- Mac running Monterey 12.6.1 with Thunderbird 115.10.1 (64-bit) -- Mac running Monterey 12.7.6 with Thunderbird 115.10.1 (64-bit) -- Mac running Sonoma 14.4 with Thunderbird 128.1.0esr (64 bit)

In this account's Tools->Message Filters, clicking Edit for SpamAssassinYes, and then not doing anything and simply clicking OK, a notifier window comes up stating:

Search Terms Invalid This filter cannot be saved because the search term "Junk Score Origin isn't" is invalid in the current context.

I've never intentionally edited the SpamAssassinYes Filter

HOW CAN I RESTORE INBOX TO FUNCTION CORRECTLY?

title: I Can't Set Up Email in Thunderbird
creator: MarjaE
content:
Account 1:

Enter name, email address, password, check "Remember password" (sic). I've also tried skipping the password for now.

Click "Continue," and see "Configuration found at email provider," good.

Click "Done," but nothing happens.

Account 2:

Enter name, email address, password, check "Remember password" (sic). I've also tried skipping the password for now.

Click "Continue," but nothing happens.

I see that there are similar posts, but they are mostly archived.

Some mention error messages. I just get no response.

Some mention enabling OAuth2. I see no such option. If I use "Advanced." the options are "Automatic," "Normal password," (sic) "Encrypted password," (sic) "Kerberos/GSSAPI," and "NTLM."

title: Change account download order
creator: qc8524
content:
I have 5 email accounts we will call them A, B, C, D , E

Sometimes my A account doesn't want to connect, and it appears to just stall on that one account.

Is there a way to have the accounts download in a different order say start with D, then E, then B, A, C?


I know I can rearrange them in a different order on the left panel, but it still wants to download in the ABCDE order.

How might one be able do that?

Thanks
